candidates.name: Ben Parsons
candidates.why_elect: I am now a self-employed Architectural Technician working out of a solar-powered studio in Northern Coromandel, but I have worked for many years in primary industries and also in corporate events production. I also maintain an organic garden in Kopu and have a deep family connection to the Coromandel Peninsula.
candidates.why_stand: I want Coromandel to be a place that our kids can be proud of; an enjoyable piece of paradise for generations to come and an example of an enlightened society.

candidates.name: Len Salt
candidates.why_elect: I have more than 40 years business experience and a proven track record of using innovation and creative thinking to find better and more cost-effective solutions. I have a deep commitment to community service, integrity and to the financial, social, environmental and economic well-being of the community I live in.
candidates.why_stand: The Coromandel needs an independent, non-aligned mayor who is prepared to listen to the people and make balanced decisions for the benefit of the whole community.
